########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})
list(APPEND flaress_sources
    float_to_double_impl.cc
    float_to_int64_impl.cc
    float_array_to_int64.cc
    snr_impl.cc
    vector_sink_int64_impl.cc
    vector_sink_double_impl.cc
    null_sink_impl.cc
    debug_func_probe_impl.cc
    null_source_impl.cc
    vector_source_double_impl.cc
    vector_source_int64_impl.cc
    int_to_int64_impl.cc
    fixed_point_math_cc_impl.cc
    fixed_point_math_ff_impl.cc
    fixed_point_math_dd_impl.cc
    integer_math_ii_impl.cc
    integer_math_ll_impl.cc
    multiply_double_impl.cc
    multiply_int64_impl.cc
    multiply_const_double_impl.cc
    multiply_const_int64_impl.cc
    add_double_impl.cc
    add_const_double_impl.cc
    add_int64_impl.cc
    add_const_int64_impl.cc
    sub_int64_impl.cc
    sub_double_impl.cc
    divide_double_impl.cc
    divide_int64_impl.cc )

set(flaress_sources "${flaress_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT flaress_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT flaress_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-flaress SHARED ${flaress_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-flaress gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-flaress
  PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
  PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-flaress PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_flaress_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-flaress PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-flaress)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
